    Introduction to Constrained KDE

    Fit the constrained kernel density estimation model with moment constraints

    fit_constrained_kde.Rd

    Fit the constrained kernel density estimation model with moment constraints

    Usage

    fit_constrained_kde(x, h)

    Arguments

    x

    The data points

    h

    The bandwidth for the kernel density estimation

    Value

    A list containing the weights, lambda, and other parameters

    Examples

    set.seed(42)
n <- 100
x <- c(rnorm(0.5 * n, 0, 1), rnorm(0.5 * n, 1.5, 1/3))
h <- 0.6
model <- fit_constrained_kde(x, h)
print(model)
